data.name: University: Future Festival Playground
data.description: Wie können die Möglichkeiten des digitalen Wandels Hochschulbildung bereichern - und zwar auf allen Ebenen? Wie verändert sich nicht nur Lehren und Lernen, sondern die Hochschule als institutionelles System? Diese Fragen stellt das University:Future Festival - Learning and Systems in a Digital Socie…

relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Day India
relatedRecords.description: AWS Community Day India 2020 is being organized by AWS User Group India. We’re united by community-led learnings and diversified by the wide variety of tools and technologies closely knit with Amazon Web Services.

relatedRecords.name: Monkey Fest USA 2020
relatedRecords.description:
MonkeyFestUSA is a brand-new Developers conference focused on covering all aspects of Cross-platform mobile development within the .NET ecosystem.
We will be covering topics like Testing, Automation, Reactive Programming, UI/UX, Maui, Xamarin.Forms, and other related topics.
